column4: hi all! I'm trying to install desktop version and the computer hangs with the white Ubuntu's logo on black screen and blinking CapsLock/ScrollLock. Where can I start to troubleshoot this?
The flashing thing on capslock etc sound like when i get kernel panic on an old laptop of mine....
what kind of pc hardware do you have?
regular asrock with SiS chipset, Celeron 800, 640Mb RAM
sound like it should work. have you tested the alternate cd?
yes, but are ther a way to get more information from the installer?
perhaps if you press ctrl alt f1 or f2 to get to a console mode...
ok I'll try that, anyway thanks!
you could perhaps also start the installer without the quiet option if you're able to and if it is one...
I didn't see such option on installer screen
perhaps you'll see it in the alternate cd
by pressing one of the F# keys
I'll try to find it, thanks
